title: Was I Right to Leave My Husband?
description:
21-year-old Sophie is having second thoughts since leaving her abusive husband. - Dr. Laura: "Don't ignore the warnings of your inner voice."

Do you usually trust your gut or second-guess yourself? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
